metadata.dc:author: de la Fuente Córdoba, M A
metadata.dc:description: UNLABELLED Patients with chronic renal insufficiency treated with hemodialysis are generally heavily medicated. To know whether patients o a dialysis unit are taking their medications as prescribed, a study was designed to find out. OBJECTIVES To profile which patients do or do not complete their medication instructions. To compare which actions taken by health care workers insures a better percentage of compliance. To confirm the adequacy of the methods used to evaluate the pharmacological treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Fármacos, quién los toma?
[Medications, who takes them?].
